name: R2-Q2 (Artoo-Kyootoo)
Lore: 'R2 units are known for expertise in computer uplinking. R2-Q2 spent several decades serving with an Imperial reconnaissance fleet in the Expansion Region.',
Text: 'While aboard any starfighter, adds 1 to power, maneuver and hyperspeed. When at a Scomp link during your draw phase, may use 1 Force to peek at top three cards of your Reserve Deck.',
